96.eng-name: Holding Fast to the Qur'an and Sunnah

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "All my followers will enter Paradise except those who refuse." They said, "O Allah's Messenger (ﷺ)! Who will refuse?" He said, "Whoever obeys me will enter Paradise, and whoever disobeys me is the one who refuses (to enter it)

chapter.ara-name: باب الاِقْتِدَاءِ بِسُنَنِ رَسُولِ اللَّهِ صلى الله عليه وسلم
chapter.eng-name: Following the Sunna of the Prophet (ﷺ)
